title: Attaque des patates

descriptions.description: In my quality control class, we had to take the game l’Attaque des patates and increase it quality! For this project we had to work in teams of 4

contributions.description: Bug fixing for the combat phases

note: The game has not been developed by myself

title: LabyBoom

descriptions.description: In my quality control class, we had to take the game Labyboom and increase it quality! For this project we had to work in teams of 2.

contributions.description: Fixed different bugs to increase the game quality
Programming of the potion that allow to go throught a wall
Report bugs in Mantis Bug Tracker

note: The game has not been developed by myself

title: Tower Simulator

descriptions.description: In my programming class, we had to develop a small tower management game with a saving system. In Tower Simulator you have to build the tallest tower in order to generate money to buy even more floors.

note: The characters visual have not been made by myself

descriptions.description: In my programming class, we had to develop a small evasion game. In Space Ninja you need to find 3 parts of a key in order the open the door that will lead you to the access code  to leave this space station.
